Name: Papillon Belvil
Description: This exclusive luxury hotel is directly situated on a beautiful 18 kilometre-long sandy beach on the Turkish Riviera in the heart of Belek, surrounded by countless pine trees. Good mini-bus connections are available to Antalya and Side. This excellent hotel was renovated in 2011 and comprises 490 rooms, which are spread over a 3-storey main building as well as several 1-3 storey bungalow buildings. Guests may make use of the spacious foyer with a 24-hour reception desk, hotel safe, currency exchange counter,a cloakroom and conference room. In addition to this, a cosy bar, a café, a newspaper stand, a hairdressing salon, shops, a nightclub, a hairdressing salon, an auditorium, a small supermarket and a restaurant will tempt guests to a relaxing drink or into sampling the cuisine on offer. All rooms comprise an en suite bathroom and are fully - equipped as standard.

Facilities.Name: All inclusive with alcoholic drinks own brands
